title: Three New Figma Buzz Features Drive Brand Momentum for Designers and Marketers

paragraphs.content: Figma launched three key updates for Figma Buzz in late 2025: configurable marketing templates linked to design systems, plugin integrations for tools like digital asset management and translation, and in-platform video trimming.These features enable teams to create customizable, on-brand assets without switching tools or risking guideline deviations.Designers can publish templates using component properties, allowing marketers to browse variations efficiently.

paragraphs.content: The updates respond to user feedback for deeper customization in asset creation workflows.Buzz, in open beta since Config 2025, supports free access across plans with publishing limits on Professional tiers.Video trimming provides precise control for social ads and collages, building on prior import/export capabilities.

sections.title: Configurable Templates and Plugin Power Transform Asset Workflows

paragraphs.content: Configurable templates connect directly to design systems, letting marketers switch layouts, colors, and elements without sifting through hundreds of variations.Figma's blog states: "Set up and publish templates using component properties, so itâ€™s simple for marketers to browse and switch between flexible templates."This setup ensures brand consistency across campaigns like social posts or event materials.

paragraphs.content: Plugin integrations bring in DAM tools like Brandfolder, TMS like Lokalise, and animation options like LottieFiles directly into Buzz.Teams can create and publish internal or community plugins via the plugins tab.Help documentation highlights asset organization and library inserts for seamless editing.

sections.title: Video Trimming and Ecosystem Integration Boost Collaboration

paragraphs.content: In-platform video trimming allows precise cuts for syncing clips or fitting time constraints, ideal for short-form content without external editors.Mondo analysis notes: "Buzz now includes in-platform video trimming and basic adjustments, allowing teams to prep social video content without switching to external tools."Forum users praised the streamlined path from templates to final assets.
